revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Edimax |model=BR-6428HPn |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=04/26/2012 |manuf_country= |is_manuf=True |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=NDD9564281116 |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8196C |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5SV8M16HS-6K |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8192CE |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=Edimax |default_ssid_regex=^Edimax$ |default_ip=192.168.2.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=1234 |oui= |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} {{TagLine|N300 High Power Wireless Broadband Router}} :[http://www.edimax.com/en/produce_detail.php?pl1_id=3&pl2_id=18&pl3_id=123&pd_id=469 Product page]
"1244-00000782-50Z" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
Per '''Edimax''''s specs, this device has 4MB Flash.
The FCC test report lists the following as addtitonal models covered by this FCC ID.. *Edimax GR-428HPn *Hawking HAWNR3, HWREN2, HWABN2
Per '''Edimax''''s manual, the default SSID is '''Edimax'''.
